TopicTitle: Warning notice/indicator/popup if Docking ports dont match.

Articles.Content:
It seems like half the time I dock 2 ships or ships to stations, I end up bouncing off a couple times before noticing that the ports sizes are not the same.

It would be great if when I target the docking port of the other ship, if there was some indicator that would warn that the target port does not match the one on my ship that I am controlling from.
That seems like a good addition to [Docking Port Alignment Indicator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43901); you might ask nicely for that feature in that thread.
Ok, I use DPAI, and your right that would be a nice feature.
